item.title: 【Off-Topic】Question: Ripper and Capper badges
item.description:
Capper - user group for members who capture/record content from webstreams or tv broadcasts.

Ripper - user group for members who mux, reencode and cut video/audio files.

If I post thread with any 1080/4k Perfomance HD Video, MV from Youtube, I can get Capper badge? Or I need to post in only from specific sites? Is any Youtube video is okay to get this badge?

If I cut small videos from music concerts and post it, I may get Ripper badge?

Can someone tell how it works?
item.author: WeLoveLOONA
